title: mmoitem 哪个版本支持1.12.2
author: 我是懒人啊
txt_content:
去wiki看了一下说不支持了1.12.2了

作者原话：
As of v5.3 (The Crafting Update), 1.12.2 support will be more minimal. We will keep updating the plugin with hopes that we can continue 1.12.2 loading fine, but it is less likely 1.12.2 will recieve support. Please do not leave error logs from 1.12 in the reviews. Join the discord if you want us to *try* and help.
[size=14.6667px]?
[size=14.6667px]然后看wiki说可以下载这个
Get MMOItems Premium over SpigotMC. If you'd like to try out the plugin first before buying it, you may get MMOItems Legacy. It is an older version of MMOItems which does not offer any many features as the premium version. It only supports Legacy (1.8-1.12.2) server builds.


下载了还是一样 不是报错就是没反应


报错：
[13:51:35 ERROR]: null
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Cannot execute command 'mi' in plugin MMOItems v4.7.19b - plugin is disabled.

replies.author: C5bb
replies.txt_content: 现在作者已经不想给1.12什么支持了 请使用1.14 或1.15  作者会在这些版本提供支持。

replies.author: 我是懒人啊
replies.txt_content:
C5bb 发表于 2020-2-6 16:46
现在作者已经不想给1.12什么支持了 请使用1.14 或1.15  作者会在这些版本提供支持。
 ...
不是，所以我想用以前的版本

replies.author: C5bb
replies.txt_content:
我是懒人啊 发表于 2020-2-6 16:49
不是，所以我想用以前的版本
服务器核心是？

replies.txt_content:
C5bb 发表于 2020-2-6 16:51
服务器核心是？
试用了两个 一个是spigot  一个是paper spigot

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: 你知道为啥有些人不用Paper端吗？因为它有些Spigot插件的确不兼容，本来我一个技能插件用的好好的，换了Paper端，全部玩家丢失技能权限，明明都已经设置好的
